mapper.select:
select DATE_FORMAT(OBS_DATE ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f') as DSTR,
${varType} as VALUE FROM CRDS WHERE STN_CD = 115 AND DEV_CD = 202 AND LEVEL_CD = 0 AND OBS_DATE >= DATE_FORMAT('${dBegin}', '%Y-%m-%d') AND OBS_DATE <= DATE_FORMAT('${targetDate} 23:59:59.999', '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f')

select DATE_FORMAT(OBS_DATE ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f') as DSTR,
${varType} as VALUE, snum ,FgA, Fg1, Fg2, Fg3, Fg4, Fg5, Fg6 FROM NEPHELO WHERE STN_CD = 132 AND DEV_CD = 109 AND OBS_DATE >= DATE_FORMAT('${dBegin}', '%Y-%m-%d') AND OBS_DATE <= DATE_FORMAT('${targetDate} 23:59:59.999', '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f')

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, max(case when Detector=0 then Value else null end) as DT_0, max(case when Detector=1 then Value else null end) as DT_1, max(case when Detector=2 then Value else null end) as DT_2, max(case when Detector=3 then Value else null end) as DT_3, max(case when Detector=4 then Value else null end) as DT_4, max(case when Detector=5 then Value else null end) as DT_5, max(case when Detector=6 then Value else null end) as DT_6, max(case when Detector=7 then Value else null end) as DT_7 FROM CPP_RADIODETPARAM_V WHERE Channel=1 AND Name='SNR' AND Detector IN (0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7) AND PID=1 AND INSTRUMENTMODE='LA' AND IMGREFDT >= TO_DATE('${dBegin}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IMGREFDT <= TO_DATE('${targetDate} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') GROUP BY IMGREFDT ORDER BY DSTR

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, VALUE, DETECTOR FROM CPP_RADIODETPARAM_V WHERE ImgRef like '${targetDate}%' AND Channel=1 AND Name='SNR' AND Detector IN (0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7) AND PID=1 AND INSTRUMENTMODE='LA' ORDER BY dStr, detector

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, max(case when Name = 'RadianceMin' then Value else null end) as Min, max(case when Name = 'RadianceMax' then Value else null end) as Max, max(case when Name = 'RadianceMean' then Value else null end) as Mean, max(case when Name = 'RadianceMedian' then Value else null end) as Median, max(case when Name = 'RadianceSTD' then Value else null end) as STD FROM CPP_RADIODETPARAM_V WHERE IMGREFDT >= TO_DATE('${dBegin}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IMGREFDT <= TO_DATE('${targetDate} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND Detector=#{detector} AND Channel=1 AND Name IN ('RadianceMin', 'RadianceMax','RadianceMean','RadianceMedian', 'RadianceSTD') AND PID=1 AND INSTRUMENTMODE='LA' and INSTRUMENT='V' GROUP BY IMGREFDT ORDER BY DSTR

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, VALUE ,NAME FROM CPP_RADIODETPARAM_V WHERE IMGREFDT >= TO_DATE('${dBegin}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IMGREFDT <= TO_DATE('${targetDate} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND Detector=#{detector} AND Channel=1 AND Name IN ('RadianceMin', 'RadianceMax','RadianceMean','RadianceMedian', 'RadianceSTD') AND PID=1 AND INSTRUMENTMODE='LA' and INSTRUMENT='V' ORDER BY dStr, name

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, VALUE ,NAME FROM CPP_RADIODETPARAM_V WHERE IMGREFDT >= TO_DATE('2013-07-09', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IMGREFDT <= TO_DATE('2013-08-09 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND Detector=#{detector} AND Channel=1 AND Name IN ('RadianceMin', 'RadianceMax','RadianceMean','RadianceMedian', 'RadianceSTD') AND PID=1 AND INSTRUMENTMODE='LA' and INSTRUMENT='V' ORDER BY dStr, name

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, detector, max(case when TID = 25 then Value else null end) as VALUE FROM CPP_RADIODETPARAM_V WHERE IMGREFDT >= TO_DATE('${dBegin}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IMGREFDT <= TO_DATE('${targetDate} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND Detector=${detector} AND PID=1 AND INSTRUMENTMODE='LA' AND INSTRUMENT='V' AND Channel=1 AND TID IN (25) GROUP BY IMGREFDT,detector ORDER BY DSTR

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, detector, max(case when TID = 25 then Value else null end) as VALUE FROM CPP_RADIODETPARAM_V WHERE IMGREFDT >= TO_DATE('${dBegin}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IMGREFDT <= TO_DATE('${targetDate} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND Detector=${detector} AND PID=1 AND INSTRUMENTMODE='LA' AND INSTRUMENT='V' AND Channel=1 AND TID IN (25) GROUP BY IMGREFDT,detector ORDER BY DSTR

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, detector, max(case when TID = 31 then Value else null end) as VALUE FROM CPP_RADIODETPARAM_V WHERE IMGREFDT >= TO_DATE('${dBegin}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IMGREFDT <= TO_DATE('${targetDate} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND Detector=${detector} AND INSTRUMENT='I' AND PID=1 AND INSTRUMENTMODE='LA' AND Channel=4 AND TID IN (31) GROUP BY IMGREFDT,detector ORDER BY DSTR

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, Channel, max(case when TID = 36 then Value else null end) as VALUE FROM CPP_RADIODETPARAM_V WHERE IMGREFDT >= TO_DATE('${dBegin}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IMGREFDT <= TO_DATE('${targetDate} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND Detector = ${detector} AND INSTRUMENT='I' AND PID=1 AND INSTRUMENTMODE='LA' AND Channel BETWEEN 2 AND 5 AND TID IN (36) GROUP BY IMGREFDT,Channel ORDER BY DSTR,Channel

SELECT TO_CHAR(ipt.IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, (bag.paramtype) as PID, bag.paramvalue as VALUE, ptype.name as TYPENAME
FROM cpp_radio_param_bag_t bag, cpp_img_product_t ipt, cpp_radio_param_type_t ptype WHERE ipt.id = bag.imageproduct AND bag.paramtype = ptype.id AND IMGREFDT >= TO_DATE('${dBegin}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IMGREFDT <= TO_DATE('${targetDate} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND bag.paramtype in (7,8,28,30,31) AND ipt.instrumentmode=4 AND bag.channel=4 AND ipt.platform=1 AND detector =${detector} ORDER BY ipt.imgref, PID

SELECT p.imgref , b.paramvalue, c.paramvalue FROM cpp_img_product_t p, CPP_RADIO_PARAM_BAG_T b, CPP_RADIO_PARAM_BAG_T c WHERE IMGREFDT >= TO_DATE('${dBegin}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IMGREFDT <= TO_DATE('${targetDate} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND b.paramtype=7 and c.paramtype=30 AND p.instrumentmode=4 and p.platform=1 AND b.detector =1 and b.channel=4 AND c.ParamValue < '5000.0' AND c.ParamValue > '-5000.0' AND p.id = b.imageproduct and b.imageproduct = c.imageproduct AND b.CHANNEL = c.CHANNEL AND b.DETECTOR = c.DETECTOR ORDER BY p.imgref

SELECT DISTINCT p.imgref DDDMYD, p.instrumentmode, (Select paramvalue from cpp_radio_param_bag_t T7 where T7.imageproduct = p.id and T7.paramtype=7 and T7.channel=4 and T7.detector=1) as "PTYPE(7)", (Select paramvalue from cpp_radio_param_bag_t T30 where T30.imageproduct = p.id and T30.paramtype=30 and T30.channel=4 and T30.detector=1) as "PTYPE(30)" FROM cpp_img_product_t p WHERE IMGREFDT >= TO_DATE('${dBegin}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IMGREFDT <= TO_DATE('${targetDate} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND p.instrumentmode=4 AND p.platform=1 ORDER BY p.imgref

SELECT DISTINCT p.imgref DDDMYD, p.instrumentmode, (Select paramvalue from cpp_radio_param_bag_t T8 where T8.imageproduct = p.id and T8.paramtype=8 and T8.channel=4 and T8.detector=1) as "PTYPE(8)", (Select paramvalue from cpp_radio_param_bag_t T28 where T28.imageproduct = p.id and T28.paramtype=28 and T28.channel=4 and T28.detector=1) as "PTYPE(28)" FROM cpp_img_product_t p WHERE IMGREFDT >= TO_DATE('${dBegin}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IMGREFDT <= TO_DATE('${targetDate} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND p.instrumentmode=4 AND p.platform=1 ORDER BY p.imgref

SELECT DISTINCT p.imgref DDDMYD, p.instrumentmode, (Select paramvalue from cpp_radio_param_bag_t T8 where T8.imageproduct = p.id and T8.paramtype=8 and T8.channel=4 and T8.detector=1) as "PTYPE(8)", (Select paramvalue from cpp_radio_param_bag_t T31 where T31.imageproduct = p.id and T31.paramtype=31 and T31.channel=4 and T31.detector=1) as "PTYPE(31)" FROM cpp_img_product_t p WHERE IMGREFDT >= TO_DATE('${dBegin}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IMGREFDT <= TO_DATE('${targetDate} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND p.instrumentmode=4 AND p.platform=1 ORDER BY p.imgref

select DSTR, VALUE, TYPEID, TYPENAME, InstrumentModeStr ,InstrumentMode, PNAME from DJF_RADIO_ENV_V where IMGREFDT >= TO_DATE('${dBegin}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IMGREFDT <= TO_DATE('${targetDate} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and InstrumentMode=4 and PID=1 And TYPEID=${varType}

select TO_CHAR(ip.IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS' )as DSTR, ebag.AVGVALUE as VALUE, ebag.VALUETYPE as TYPEID, etype.name as TYPENAME, FC_ToModeStr(ip.InstrumentMode) AS InstrumentModeStr, ip.INSTRUMENTMODE, p.name as PNAME from CPP_IMG_PRODUCT_T ip, CPP_RADIO_ENV_BAG_T ebag, CPP_RADIO_ENV_TYPE_T etype, CPP_PLATFORM_T p where ip.ID = ebag.IMAGEPRODUCT and ebag.VALUETYPE = etype.ID and ip.PLATFORM = p.ID and ip.ImgRefDT >= TO_DATE('${dBegin}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and ip.ImgRefDT <= TO_DATE('${targetDate} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and ebag.VALUETYPE=${varType} and p.ID=1 and ip.InstrumentMode=4

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, ROIID, ROINAME, IMGMODEID, IMGMODE, COUNT FROM CPP_NAVPERFO_V WHERE IMGREFDT >= TO_DATE('${dBegin}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IMGREFDT <= TO_DATE('${targetDate} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND PID=1 AND ROIID=1 AND IMGMODEID in (0,1,2,3,4) order by DSTR, IMGMODEID

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, ROIID,ROINAME, IMGMODEID, IMGMODE, AverageEW, AverageNS FROM CPP_NAVPERFO_V WHERE IMGREFDT >= TO_DATE('${dBegin}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IMGREFDT <= TO_DATE('${targetDate} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND PID=1 AND ROIID=1 AND IMGMODEID IN (0,1,2,3,4) ORDER BY DSTR, IMGMODEID

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, ROIID, ROINAME, IMGMODEID, IMGMODE, STDDEVEW, STDDEVNS FROM CPP_NAVPERFO_V WHERE IMGREFDT >= TO_DATE('${dBegin}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IMGREFDT <= TO_DATE('${targetDate} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND PID=1 AND ROIID=1 AND IMGMODEID in (0,1,2,3,4) order by DSTR, IMGMODEID

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, ROIID,ROINAME, IMGMODEID, IMGMODE, QUADDIST FROM CPP_NAVPERFO_V WHERE IMGREFDT >= TO_DATE('${dBegin}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IMGREFDT <= TO_DATE('${targetDate} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND PID=1 AND ROIID=1 AND IMGMODEID in (0,1,2,3,4) order by DSTR, IMGMODEID

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, ROIID, COUNT FROM CPP_NAVPERFO_V WHERE IMGREFDT >= TO_DATE('${dBegin}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IMGREFDT <= TO_DATE('${targetDate} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND IMGMODEID = 1 AND PID=1 AND RoiID IN (1,2,3,4,5) ORDER BY DSTR, RoiID

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, ROIID, AverageEW, AverageNS FROM CPP_NAVPERFO_V WHERE IMGREFDT >= TO_DATE('${dBegin}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IMGREFDT <= TO_DATE('${targetDate} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND IMGMODEID = 1 AND PID=1 AND RoiID IN (1,2,3,4,5) ORDER BY DSTR, RoiID

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, ROIID, STDDEVEW, STDDEVNS FROM CPP_NAVPERFO_V WHERE IMGREFDT >= TO_DATE('${dBegin}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IMGREFDT <= TO_DATE('${targetDate} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND IMGMODEID = 1 AND PID=1 AND RoiID IN (1,2,3,4,5) ORDER BY DSTR, RoiID

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, ROIID, QUADDIST FROM CPP_NAVPERFO_V WHERE IMGREFDT >= TO_DATE('${dBegin}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IMGREFDT <= TO_DATE('${targetDate} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND IMGMODEID = 1 AND PID=1 AND RoiID IN (1,2,3,4,5) ORDER BY DSTR, RoiID

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, ROIID, AverageEW, AverageNS FROM CPP_NAVPERFO_V WHERE IMGREFDT >= TO_DATE('${dBegin}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IMGREFDT <= TO_DATE('${targetDate} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND IMGMODEID = 1 AND PID=1 AND RoiID IN (1,2,3,4,5) ORDER BY DSTR, RoiID

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREF, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, CENTERX FROM CPP_SCPOS_V WHERE IMGREF >= TO_DATE('${dBegin}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IMGREF <= TO_DATE('${targetDate} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND PID=1 ORDER BY DSTR

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREF, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, VALUEX, VALUEY, VALUEZ FROM CPP_SCATT_V WHERE IMGREF >= TO_DATE('${dBegin}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IMGREF <= TO_DATE('${targetDate} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND PID=1 ORDER BY DSTR
